text: The 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup will be the 10th FIFA Futsal World Cup, the quadrennial international futsal championship contested by the men's national teams of the member associations of FIFA. The tournament will be held in TBD. ==Host Selection== ===Expressed interest in bidding=== AFC :* India CAF :* Morocco CONCACAF :* Mexico :* United States :* Guatemala ==Qualification== A total of TBD teams qualify for the final tournament, In addition one country will qualify automatically as host, TBD other teams qualify from six separate continental competitions. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Confederation !Qualifying tournament !Team !data-sort-type="number"|Appearance !Last appearance !Previous best performance |- |rowspan=1|AFC |2024 AFC Futsal Championship |TBD | | | |- |rowspan=1|CAF ||2024 Africa Futsal Cup of Nations |TBD | | | |- |rowspan=1|CONCACAF |2024 CONCACAF Futsal Championship |TBD | | | |- |rowspan=1|CONMEBOL |2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup qualification (CONMEBOL) |TBD | | | |- |rawspan=1|OFC |2023 OFC Futsal Nations Cup |TBD | | | |- |rowspan=1|UEFA |2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup qualification (UEFA) |TBD | | | |- |} ==Venues== To Be Confirmed ==References== Category:FIFA Futsal World Cup Category:2024
title: 2024 FIFA Futsal World Cup
